name: cursed-body

effect.scarlet-violet: Moves that hit this Pokémon have a 30% chance of being Disabled afterward.
effect.the-teal-mask: Moves that hit this Pokémon have a 30% chance of being Disabled afterward.
effect.the-indigo-disk: Moves that hit this Pokémon have a 30% chance of being Disabled afterward.

short_effect: Has a 30% chance of Disabling any move that hits the Pokémon.
